segments.text: I cannot stop looking at the growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's expanding with every passing second, creeping further out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The continuous sheet of water over the sink's edge is quite alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I imagine the damage this is doing to the wooden cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water seeping into the joins and under the floorboards will be a nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire kitchen will soon be a hazard zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a complete disregard for the property.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman just keeps wiping her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of stepping into that cold, deep puddle myself makes me shiver.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm afraid for the integrity of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is deteriorating rapidly, right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a preventable and unpleasant mess this is becoming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to turn off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR
